overview: David Hart is the Director of E4Tech, a business consultancy focused on sustainable energy based in the UK and Switzerland. He is also Head of Fuel Cell and Hydrogen research at Imperial College Londonâ€™s Centre for Energy Policy and Technology (ICEPT). He has consulted and carried out research on fuel cell and hydrogen issues for a wide range of organizations worldwide. David holds degrees in Mechanical Engineering with German from the University of Bath and in Environmental Technology from Imperial College, London. His PhD was in Hydrogen Energy Systems.
